blog.title: 8 Golden Rules of Interface Design
blog.summary: Shneiderman devised 8 rules of interface design. Elements of these rules can be found in many modern interfaces used today.

blog.title: Quick Guide to DHCP
blog.summary: The dynamic host configuration protocol, abbreviated as DHCP, is a protocol used in networks for servers to _dynamically_ assign IP addresses to clients in the network.

blog.title: Quick Guide to Regex
blog.summary: Regular expressions, more commonly known as regex, is a powerful way of describing patterns in strings.

blog.title: Unicast, Multicast, and Broadcast
blog.summary: There are 3 types of traffic in a network: unicast, multicast, and broadcast.
